table.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

tr.style: border: 2px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : left; background-color: white; border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

a.title: Minimum and Maximum # of times the the itemcan appear in the instance

text.value: Prestroke functional status: Ambulation. Were you able to walk before your stroke or transient ischaemic attack?

display.value: 1 = Able to walk without help from another person with or without a device.

text.value: Prestroke functional status: Toileting. Did you need help from anybody to go to the toilet before your stroke or transient ischaemic attack?

display.value: 1 = I could manage going to the toilet without assistance.

text.value: Prestroke functional status: Dressing. Did you need help with dressing/undressing before your stroke or transient ischaemic attack?

display.value: 1 = I could manage dressing/undressing without help.

text.value: Poststroke functional status: Ambulation. Are you able to walk?

display.value: 2 = Able to walk with help from another person.

text.value: Poststroke functional status: Toileting. Do you need help from anybody to go to the toilet?

display.value: 1 = I could manage going to the toilet without assistance.

text.value: Poststroke functional status: Dressing. Do you need help with dressing/undressing?
